quest.name: Keeping Up Appearances
journal:
 Quest Sync
As ablest of Ixal, Yazel Ahuatan has a reputation to maintain.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 1 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 41 and above.

The recent loss of starboard hull component materials has placed Yazel Ahuatan in a precarious position. So that none may have cause to doubt his ableness, recover the materials his courier abandoned when attacked by Ixal in Treespeak.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

After a brief skirmish, the materials are yours. However, returning the materials will not suffice to redeem Yazel Ahuatan. Visit the crafting facility at Treespeak Stables, and present the component materials to Nellemond, so that you may use the facilities to construct the requisite components.

You have handed over the component materials to Nellemond, and gained access to the crafting facility. Synthesize two starboard hull components, and deliver them to Yazel Ahuatan at Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Finishing wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Nellemond.

The squa-hawk which echoes throughout Ehcatl is one of ultimate relief, as Yazel Ahuatan's comrades no longer have cause to doubt his competence. Maintaining an image as an able Ixal can be difficult at times, but the adulation of Ixali maidens more than justifies the effort─or so Yazel Ahuatan would doubtless say, if the question were put to him.
objectives: Obtain starboard hull component materials from the Ehcatl Nine storage pots in Treespeak.
Present the starboard hull component materials to Nellemond at Treespeak Stables.
Synthesize starboard hull componentsDeliver the starboard hull components to Yazel Ahuatan the Able.

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Squaaawk! Able though I am, cursed with terrible fortune, I am too! Lost to Garuda-worshipping buzzards, materials for constructing urgently required starboard hull components are!

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Precious materials for constructing the hull, lost to our enemies in Treespeak! Squa-hawk!

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Precious materials for preparing an essential finish for the hull, lost to our enemies in Treespeak! Squa-hawk!

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Precious materials for preparing leather-backed plywood for the hull, lost to our enemies in Treespeak! Squa-hawk!

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Retrieve the materials myself, I would, but able lover, Yazel is─not able fighter. Featherless craftswomancraftsman and fighter both, you are, and more than capable of recovering materials.

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: From storage pots, retrieve the materials, then for crafting, to Treespeak Stables you must go. Open to all featherless, the facilities there are. Squahaha! Need for special favors, there is not.

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Materials enough for two components, you must recover! Without components, Yazel will fall out of favor. Able to suffer much, Yazel is, except that!

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: With a cacophony of squawking, the enemy appears!

dialogue.name: BALOON
dialogue.text: Squaaawk! Friend of Ehcatl, you die!

dialogue.name: NELLEMOND
dialogue.text: Greetings, friend! Our doors─assuming we had any─are open to all! You wish to process those materials, yes? Hmmm... If you would first permit me to conduct an inspection...?

dialogue.name: NELLEMOND
dialogue.text: Ah, my concern was for naught. These materials are both quality and plentiful! In fact, I have calculated the optimum amount required to craft the components you have in mind. I shall hold on to the excess while you work your synthesizing magic! Pray let me know if you require any replacements.

dialogue.name: NELLEMOND
dialogue.text: The use of the crafting facility here at Treespeak Stables is entirely free of charge! Pray put concerns of sordid coin from your mind and concentrate on your wondrous creation!

dialogue.name: NELLEMOND
dialogue.text: Your crafting endeavor was a success? Then you must waste no time in returning to your client. Ah, and should something unfortunate befall your commission─accidental loss, theft, act of primal─you always have the option of retrieving from me the remaining materials and trying again!

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Squaaawk! Suffer the barbs of his comrades, the Able cannot! Bring me the starboard hull components, you must!

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Squa-hawk! Safe, my reputation is! To featherless craftswomancraftsman, much and more is owed!

dialogue.name: YAZELAHUATAN
dialogue.text: Rejoin the ranks of the buzzards, I wish not to do. Much more beloved by maidens, Yazel is, as able revolutionary!

dialogue.name: POPMESSAGE
dialogue.text: You now have access to the crafting facility.
